Reviews.Title: My BlackBerry 9360...
Reviews.Author: Humberto Quijada
Reviews.Content: Me gusta mucho este telefono real mente mejoro mucho con respecto al BB 9300.... Este producto se puede utilizar en mi Pais Venezuela en las plataformas Movistar y Movilnet 3G (Banda 1900 Mhz), gracias por la atencion

Reviews.Title: White BB Curve 9360
Reviews.Author: RaynDrops
Reviews.Content: This phone is gorgeous, small and sleek. it is best suited for someone with small hands and fingers. It gives you a luxurious feel with its bright display and soft nice buttons. The picture and video quality is really good better than i expected. Its definately an eyecatcher and worth every penny. I purchased from Yapper Wireless and the phone came with all the accesories and i am happy with that. It is unlocked I jus had to put in my Digicel Sim (Jamaica) and it was good to go :) The only thing i would say is that it often feels warm to touch but not hot and the battery may not be the best but if u hav a spare charger or get another battery shud be perfect. All in all..its a nice little fone..an i really like it :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone. I Am In Love!
Reviews.Author: Kavi M
Reviews.Content: At first i was skeptical about purchasing a phone through Amazon because I had never done that before. My doubts are gone! This phone arrived in a timely manner although there was a storm when the delivery was taking place. I really appreciate that. It arrived in good packaging, etc.Good Points:- Its an awesome phone. This is my first Blackberry and i love it. Its easy enough to learn your way around- it operates really efficiently in terms of browsing- It plays media wonderfully,its my new favNot so good points:- the body of the phone will need protecting from falls and scratches as the screen and casing both scratch easily.- the battery life isn't long lasting. some days i need to recharge 2 - 3 times depending on usage. (i keep my phone on silent to conserve battery power but still multiple charges are needed)Overall, i would definitely recommend this phone if you're looking for an affordable introduction to the Blackberry world or just a replacement for your old one. I have had it for over 3 months so far and there's been no major problems to report. I have been surfing the internet, downloading music, apps, games etc. I would definitely buy this phone again! I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Drigelio Nunez
Reviews.Content: wrong with phone overheats month and reset not recommend it, do not buy it is of poor quality, and the price is very high

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Jorge Oropeza
Reviews.Content: excellent product. made the purchase based on the specifications laid out in the notice. I am very happy with the product purchased

Reviews.Title: Have a problem with the phone; port no good
Reviews.Author: chikola james
Reviews.Content: The port of the phone is no good (i.e. phone unable to charge) and I will like to know if I can return it?

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: ADRIANA ALVAREZ
Reviews.Content: Very good product. Simple but stylish and very easy to use. Ready to use with any carrier in the country.

Reviews.Content: I RECEIVE IT THIS WEEK IN VENEZUELA, AND I'M VERY VERY ANGRY 'CAUSE MY PHONES CAME REFURBISHED! I WANT A REFOUND BECAUSE THAT ISN'T IN THE DESCRIPTION!

Reviews.Title: the phone did not work would not charge at all.
Reviews.Author: BENJAUDYS KEREKES
Reviews.Content: the phonedid not work , could not get it charged , when i took it to get repair they talked me that coud not be fixed and that the cell was already repair before.

Reviews.Title: Worse than expected.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: I bought a refurbished phone it did not look right at all. The silver trim would easily peel away from the phone and the piece of plastic above the keyboard with the call/end keys did not line up correctly with the rest of the phone.It ran pretty slow, but I'm sure that can be attributed to the BlackBerry OS.

Reviews.Title: ME CANCELARON EL ENVIO Y NO ME HAN DEVUELTO EL DINERO
Reviews.Author: Jose martinez
Reviews.Content: ESTOY MOLESTO PORQUE ESTA EMPRESA ME CANCELO EL ENVIO DEL TELEFONO POR INDISPONIBILIDAD DESDE EL 06/07/12 Y HASTA LA FECHA NO ME HAN DEVUELTO EL DINERO, LES HE ESCRITO EN DOS OPORTUNIDADES Y NO HAN CONTESTADO EL CORREO

Reviews.Title: I really love my Phone
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: i was in doubt to buy this phone,but afeter a long time i decided to buy and have been a really good experience, its fast, fancy and comfortable to handle,I bought it refurbish and its the same like NEW!I would buy it again and again, seller was good and the package was at time!

Reviews.Title: Celular blackberry 9360
Reviews.Author: Lucia
Reviews.Content: El celular me llego en perfectas condiciones. Soy de Argentina y me anda para cualquier empresa (movistar, claro y personal), anda bien, ninguna queja!!

Reviews.Title: It doesnt works

Reviews.Content: This phone doenst work since the moment i open the box the phone reboots and reboots it cames whit the board damaged dont buy it you will waste your money

Reviews.Title: BB CURVE 9360
Reviews.Author: Wilson Camacho "Wilson"
Reviews.Content: buena noches quisiera saber si me levanta 3G PARA LAS OPERADORAS DE MOVITAR VENEZUELA DIGITEL O MOVILNET ESPERO RESPUESTAS GRACIAS.

Reviews.Title: Not up to expectations
Reviews.Author: Nigel James
Reviews.Content: the phone was not up to expectations. the top of the phone is lifting off and the phone keeps cutting off.

Reviews.Title: Good.... not the best
Reviews.Author: Gaby V. Casilla
Reviews.Content: Nice cellphone... great color, great size but horrible battery duration!!!!....and this blackberry curve 9360w sucks!!! I used to have a curve 8520 and works great!!! this model overheat if you talk for a long time and sometimes start to work really slow... Dont like it

Reviews.Title: Great for someone that needs something affordable, but still needs the internet / email
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, if you're just looking for a replacement. It does basic stuff that you would need, but if you want to take pictures and play games I'd definitely recommend getting an iPhone. I got this phone as a replacement to save up for a new iPhone and love it. My emails and texts pop up right away and show a red flash whenever I get a message, it's amazingly easy to type on, and the internet browser is still really fast!

Reviews.Title: BB liberado sin idiomas como el español
Reviews.Author: Jonckson Ruiz
Reviews.Content: BB should have released Spanish language, buy to Venezuela and had to upgrade in order to use and makes your performance decay

Reviews.Title: PHONE REFUSED TO TURN-ON
Reviews.Author: John T. Mathurin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone in August for my sister as a birthday gift (birthday in October). Therefore I never opened and put on the phone until last week. All efforts to get the phone turned-on has proven futile. I was told to remove the battery and put it back but to no avail. The phone just refuses to turn-on. I have now been told that it is too late to return and get a replacement.This is really a case of a seller selling a bad product. Simply, the seller should do the honorable thing and refund me the money I paid for the phone.A check on the phone has revealed that the power-on ic is faulty in the phone. Hence the reason the phone refused to turn-on. Was the supplier already aware of that and hence the reason did not give any warranty?

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Diego Repossi
Reviews.Content: It has a very nice design.  It has a faster OS.  The price is a good deal.  The only thing that is missing is the warranty (hope I do not have to use it)

Reviews.Title: excelente

Reviews.Content: el articulo es justo lo que esperaba, el articulo se encontraba en perfecto estado y sin detalles, lo recomiendo 100%, excelente

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Content: Excellent service 100% Recommended persons responsible kind attentive and with good customer service. excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent

Reviews.Title: THANKS

Reviews.Content: I am pleased with my purchase. I bought this device for  my niece in the caribbean. She will be getting it next month.I will update you with her gift.

Reviews.Title: Perfecto

Reviews.Content: Compre un BB para Venezuela y no tuve ningun inconveniente para instalarle una linea con Movilnet, tambien levanta Digitel y Movistar aunque con Movistar no levanto nunca 3G, situacion diferente con las otras operadoras. El telefono es lindo y muy funcional.

Reviews.Content: El celular es excelente, ligero, comodo y tiene muchas funciones, adicional a eso es rapido y acepta 3G en Digitel en Venezuela donde estoy... lo recomiendo ampliamente...!

Reviews.Title: excelente

Reviews.Content: excelente atención, rápido, inmediata, responsables, capaces de cumplir con todas las expectativas esperadas, espero que continúen así, buenas tardes , el teléfono me pareció excelente, gracias

Reviews.Title: malo
Reviews.Author: Christian Medina
Reviews.Content: AVISO IMPORTANTE PARA VENEZUELA ESTE EQUIPO NO SIRVE CON MOVISTAR NI MOVILNET, NO TOMA EL 3G, NO LO COMPREN.PARA MI PERSONA FUE UNA COMPRA MUY MALA.

Reviews.Title: MI COMPRA
Reviews.Author: Johanna C. Castro G
Reviews.Content: HOLA SOY VENEZOLANA ME GUSTO EL EL TELÉFONO SUPER LINDO SOLO QUE PENSÉ ME FUNCIONARIA 3G PARA MOVILNET POR LOS COMENTARIOS ANTERIORES Y NO FUE ASÍ, LA BANDA QUE USA EL TELÉFONO SON DIFERENTES A LOS QUE USA MOVILNET Y MOVISTAR EN 3G SIN EMBARGO PARA DIGITEL SI FUNCIONA, EL TELÉFONO FUNCIONA SOLO ESE DETALLE. PARA LLAMADAS Y MENSAJES FUNCIONO CON CUALQUIER CHIP DE TELEFONÍA MÓVIL EN VENEZUELA. OTRA COSA FUE QUE NO TRAJO CD DE INSTALACIÓN DEL PROGRAMA DE BLACKBERRY LO QUE ME PARECIÓ POCO COMÚN. ES IMPORTANTE QUE EN LA DESCRIPCIÓN DE LOS TELÉFONOS COLOQUEN EN QUE BANDA TRABAJA 3G PARA ASÍ UNO ORIENTARSE MEJOR Y NO JUGAR AL AZAR. EL ENVIO FUE RESPONSABLE Y PUNTUAL.HELLO I AM ME LIKE THE VENEZUELAN PHONE CUTE JUST THOUGHT THAT FOR ME MOVILNET 3G CLERK BY THE PREVIOUS COMMENTS AND NOT, THE BAND ARE USING THE PHONE USING DIFFERENT TO MOVILNET and Movistar 3G BUT IT WORKS FOR DIGITEL , THE PHONE WORKS ONLY THAT DETAIL. WORKED FOR CALLS AND MESSAGES TO ANY MOBILE CHIP IN VENEZUELA. ELSE WAS NOT BROUGHT CD INSTALLATION PROGRAM WHAT I THINK BLACKBERRY UNUSUAL. IT IS IMPORTANT THAT THE DESCRIPTION OF THE BAND THAT TURN PHONE WORK AND ONE FOR 3G AND NO PLAY better targeted RANDOM. THE SHIPPING WAS RESPONSIBLE AND TIMELY.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Tenshi22
Reviews.Content: This is my first blackberry ever and I'm in love with it. I love how thin this phone is. It perfectly fits in a woman's hand.Shipment:The shipment was delayed, but just for a day. Maybe its because of the carrier that's shipping it. So I dont blame the seller or amazon. :)What comes in the box: (I'll just include this since I don't find it in the ad) :)*blackberry curve 9360*EM1 battery*2gb micro sd (it's already inserted inside the phone)*usb cable*2 charger adapter (this is sooo cool.. i like it)*headset*manuals :)

Reviews.Title: refurbish phone

Reviews.Content: i have written you two previous e-mail asking about the refurbish phone you sent me when the cost of a new phone was deducted from my card and is still waiting for a reply. Please clarify before i take further action.

Reviews.Content: el producto llego rápido al destino, excelente servicio; agradecido buena puntuación,  sin mas que decir y una prointa nueva compra

Guess we'll find out and leave another review to confirm. According to other reviews on this and similar devices I'm confident its a good buy. thanks again.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE

Reviews.Content: I HAD A VERY GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH PURCHASE THE PHONE CAME IN GOOD CONDICIONES.EXCELENTE CALIDAD.LO RECOMMEND., CAME WITH ALL THE INFORMATION REQUESTED IN RECORD TIME AND LIGHT USE THE SERVICE OF AMAZON PRIME.SALUDOS I RECOMMEND

Reviews.Title: Informacion!
Reviews.Author: alery
Reviews.Content: Que viene dentro de la caja...? hace algunos meses atras compre otro tlf y dentro venia el aparato y el cargador no trajo ningun accesorio, ni el cd de instalacion, ni los manuales... No fue con este vendedor obviamente pero quisiera saber para  comprar otro..! gracias!!!what comes inside the box ...? a few months ago I bought another phone and inside the box only came up the phone and the charger did not bring any accessory, or the installation cd or manuals ... would like to know to buy another ..! thanks!ps: was not for this seller
